<title level="1" pfs="">[Clockwork Buccaneer](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1980)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Clockwork buccaneers are powerful constructs designed for naval combat. Whereas most clockwork creations sink to the ocean floor while at sea, clockwork buccaneers can use their water jets to easily propel themselves through the water or leap aboard enemy ships. In addition to an internal water tank and hydraulic pumps, most clockwork buccaneers are equipped with a cutlass and arm gun loaded with scatter shot.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Construct](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4)): DC 28

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 26

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 23
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 9">[Clockwork Buccaneer](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1980)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Clockwork" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=331" />
<trait label="Construct" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=35" />
<trait label="Mindless" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=108" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #180: The Smoking Gun](/Sources.aspx?ID=125) pg. 80</row>

**Perception** +18; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +18, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +12, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +20

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +5

**Dex** +6

**Con** +3

**Int** -5

**Wis** +2

**Cha** -5
</row>

**Wind Up** 24 hours, DC 26, standby

**Items**
_+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [scimitar](/Weapons.aspx?ID=38)_

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 28 

**Fort** +17 

**Ref** +21 

**Will** +15 

</row>

**HP** 140

**Immunities**
[death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [doomed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=9), [drained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10), [fatigued](/Conditions.aspx?ID=15), [healing](/Traits.aspx?ID=89), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117), [nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188) attacks, [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poisoned](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [sickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38)

**Resistances**
physical 10 (except [adamantine](/Equipment.aspx?ID=374) or orichalcum)

**Weaknesses**
[electricity](/Traits.aspx?ID=56) 10, [orichalcum](/Equipment.aspx?ID=378) 10

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_scimitar_ +21 ([Forceful](/Traits.aspx?ID=180), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Sweep](/Traits.aspx?ID=194)),
**Damage** 2d6+11 slashing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
arm gun +21 ([Concussive](/Traits.aspx?ID=401), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [range 40 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 1](/Traits.aspx?ID=254), [scatter 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=413)),
**Damage** 2d8+6 piercing

**Firearms Critical Specialization**   When the buccaneer makes a critical hit with a [firearm](/WeaponGroups.aspx?ID=16), the target must succeed at a DC 28 Fortitude save or be [stunned 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=36).

**Pirate's Feint** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) The clockwork buccaneer [Feints](/Actions.aspx?ID=48). If the target becomes [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) to the buccaneer's melee attacks, it becomes flat-footed to the buccaneer's ranged attacks as well.

**Refill Tank** <actions string="Single Action" />  **Requirements** The clockwork buccaneer is within 15 feet of a water source containing at least 100 gallons of water; **Effect** The clockwork buccaneer extends a clockwork tube and sucks up water to refill its water tank.

**[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)**   The clockwork buccaneer deals an extra 2d6 precision damage to [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) creatures.

**Water Jet** <actions string="Single Action" />  **Requirements** The clockwork buccaneer has a full water tank; **Effect** The clockwork buccaneer fires a narrow but highly pressurized blast of water in a 60-foot line, dealing 10d6 bludgeoning damage to creatures and unattended objects in the area (DC 28 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Fortitude save; unattended objects automatically fail). Creatures and objects that fail the save are also [knocked back](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) 5 feet (10 feet on a critical failure). This empties the buccaneer's water tank.

**Water Jump** <actions string="Single Action" />  **Requirements** The clockwork buccaneer has a full water tank; **Effect** The clockwork buccaneer jumps 60 feet, propelling itself through the air with a jet of water. This empties the buccaneer's water tank.

</column>

<aside>
<title level="2" noclass="true" icon="/images/Icons/Sidebar_2_AdditionalLore.png">Clockwork Shanties</title>

Some inventors choose to imbue their clockwork buccaneers with automated voice modules instead of water tanks. Buccaneers can use these prerecorded songs or phrases to inspire living crew members or strike fear into enemies.
</aside>
